original_text: Nadab and Abihu, however, died before the Lord when they made an offering with unauthorized fire before him in the Desert of Sinai. They had no sons, so Eleazar and Ithamar served as priests during the lifetime of their father Aaron.
korean_text: 나답과 아비후는 시내 광야에서 여호와 앞에 다른 불을 드리다가 여호와 앞에서 죽어 자식이 없었으며 엘르아살과 이다말이 그의 아버지 아론 앞에서 제사장의 직분을 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: Nadab and Abihu, however, died before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나답과 아비후는 주 앞에서 죽었으며

sentences.original_text: when they made an offering with unauthorized fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 허락되지 않은 불로 제물을 드렸을 때

sentences.original_text: before him in the Desert of Sinai
so Eleazar and Ithamar served as priests
during the lifetime of their father Aaron
